docs.snippet: For all the revelations about its brutality, pro football is more popular and profitable than ever. How the N.F.L. commissioner and a group of billionaire owners have kept the league on offense....
docs.lead_paragraph: For all the revelations about its brutality, pro football is more popular and profitable than ever. How the N.F.L. commissioner and a group of billionaire owners have kept the league on offense.
docs.abstract: Pro-football, despite disclosures about grievous injuries suffered by players, is only growing in popularity due to defensive measures of Roger Goodell and NFL.

docs.snippet: The economic gap within the African-American community is one of the most important factors in the rise of Black Lives Matter, led by a new generation of college graduates and students....
docs.lead_paragraph: The economic gap within the African-American community is one of the most important factors in the rise of Black Lives Matter, led by a new generation of college graduates and students.
docs.abstract: Prof Henry Louis Gates Jr essay examines Black Lives Matter movement in context of history of civil rights movement in America; focusing on income inequality within black community itself, holds social and economic class division is one of most critical and overlooked factors in rise of movement led by new generation of college graduates and students.

headline.main: Black America and the Class Divide
headline.print_headline: Black America and the Class Divide
